welcome_message_body: Welcome to Asahikawa, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, delicious food, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!

restaurants.name: Jingisukan Daikokuya (成吉思汗 大黒屋 五丁目店)
restaurants.description: Jingisukan Daikokuya (成吉思汗 大黒屋 五丁目店) is a bbq joint located in 旭川市.

restaurants.name: Tenkin Asahikawa (らーめんや天金 四条)
restaurants.description: Tenkin Asahikawa (らーめんや天金 四条) is a ramen restaurant located in 旭川市.

restaurants.name: 自由軒
restaurants.description: 自由軒 is a yoshoku restaurant located in 旭川市.

restaurants.name: 炭や 旭川店
restaurants.description: 炭や 旭川店 is a bbq joint located in 旭川市.
restaurants.address: 5条通8丁目右3, 旭川市, 北海道, 070-0035

restaurants.name: ぎんねこ
restaurants.description: ぎんねこ is a yakitori restaurant located in 旭川市.
restaurants.address: 5条通7-右6 (5・7小路ふらりーと内), 旭川市, 北海道, 070-0035

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Asahikawa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
